title: AnyNumberAssign (Function)
text:
FUNCTION AnyNumberAssign :
Error
Assign AnyNumber from source to dest.
This assignment does not convert (base) type - so dest.baseType needs to be equal to source.baseType.
In case dest.baseType is default (AnyNumberType.TYPE_NONE) the dest.baseType will be set to source.baseType.
In case dest.isPtr = TRUE, the according POINTER (TO data - AnyNumber.u.p.p*) needs to be set prior to AnyNumberAssign().
Returns Error.AnyNumberError if source or dest are not consistent.
